questions.question: On April 30, 2009, a three-year insurance policy was purchased for $18,000 with coverage to begin immediately. What is the amount of insurance expense that would appear on the company's income statement for the year ended December 31, 2009?

This other company paid the entire $6,400 cash on October 1, which PPW Co. recorded as unearned revenue. The journal entry made by PPW Co. at year- end on December 31, 2009 would include:
questions.a: A debit to Rent Earned for $2,400.
questions.b: A credit to Unearned Rent for $2,400.
questions.d: A credit to Rent Earned for $2,400.
questions.e: A debit to Unearned Rent for $4,000.

questions.question: On May 1, 2009 Giltus Advertising Company received $1,500 from Julie Bee for advertising services to be completed April 30, 2010. questions.a: A debit to Unearned Fees for $500.
questions.b: A credit to Unearned Fees for $500.
questions.c: A credit to Earned Fees for $1,000.
questions.d: A debit to Earned Fees for $1,000.
questions.e: A debit to Earned Fees for $500.

questions.d: Debit Salaries Expense and credit Salaries Payable.

questions.d: Debit Insurance Expense, $7,750; credit Prepaid Insurance, $7,750.
